meanings.definition: Not failing or falling short; reliable
meanings.sent1: Her unfailing support always made me feel better.
meanings.sent2: The unfailing light of the lighthouse guided ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent3: His unfailing ability to find lost items became legendary among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The unfailing love of a mother is like a warm blanket on a cold night.
meanings.sent5: The unfailing smile on her face brightened up the room instantly.

meanings.definition: Continuing without failure or weakening; constant
meanings.sent1: The unfailing rhythm of the drum kept everyone dancing all night.
meanings.sent2: His unfailing dedication to his work earned him a promotion.
meanings.sent3: The unfailing flow of jokes from the comedian kept the audience laughing.
meanings.sent4: The unfailing stream of water from the fountain was a soothing sound in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The unfailing ticking of the clock marked the passage of time in the room.
